key.name: timers
key.description: JSON string containing array of timer configurations

key.name: activate-time
key.description: Time when timers should be activated in the morning (HH:MM format)

key.name: deactivate-time
key.description: Time when timers should be deactivated in the evening (HH:MM format)

key.name: last-activation-date
key.description: ISO string of the last time timers were activated

key.name: last-deactivation-date
key.description: ISO string of the last time timers were deactivated
